snippet: The chancellor of the Exchequer, George Osborne, announced a set of modest tax breaks and measures to bolster savings, business investment and exports.
abstract: George Osborne, Britain's chancellor of the Exchequer, lays out new financial plans that include help for savers and retirees, as well as measures meant to spur business investment.
lead_paragraph: The chancellor of the Exchequer, George Osborne, announced a set of modest tax breaks and measures to bolster savings, business investment and exports.

headline.main: British Budget Outlines Higher Growth and Help for Savers and Retirees
headline.print_headline: British Budget Offers Help for Savers and Retirees
